lines.text: No Norwegian proposes to a Lapp girl and no Lapp girl marries a daro.
You are and will always be a daro, a really evil daro!
I am just a poor Lapp girl!
Would you betray me as the daro betrayed you?
Take her with you. But never forget that she is Norwegian and that daro blood runs through her veins!
Wolves are attacking the reindeer herds!
Your eyes remind me of someone, but I do not know who.
The bridal crown weighs heavily upon Laila.
